6.TitleEnglish: A Dracula Villa Murder Case (1)
6.SummaryEnglish: Kogoro, Ran and Conan go to a famous mans house in which, the man is famous for writing Dracula stories. He also dresses like Dracula. Then, at night, around 10, his servant went to his room with a bottle of juice for him and found him dead in the same way one would kill Dracula. Who killed him?
6.TitleJapanese: ドラキュラ荘殺人事件（前編）

7.SummaryEnglish: The case continues. Can Conan figure out who killed this famous author?
7.TitleJapanese: ドラキュラ荘殺人事件（後編）

8.TitleEnglish: The Murder Case of the Flower Smell
8.SummaryEnglish: Kogoro and Conan attend Rika Okano's ikebana award ceremony to investigate a threat letter announcing a murder. When the murder occurs, Conan notices something strange about the flower the victim had. Will another murder take place?!
8.TitleJapanese: 花の香り殺人事件

9.TitleEnglish: The Case of the Hospitalized Burgulary Suspect
9.SummaryEnglish: The Detective Boys visit Kogoro, who is at the hospital with a broken foot. The other patient in the room is overheard saying there was a 100 million yen heist and the criminals are still at large. Who is Kogoro’s roommate?!
9.TitleJapanese: 強盗犯人入院事件

10.TitleEnglish: The Fearful Mountain Trek Murder Case (1)
10.SummaryEnglish: Kogoro is hired to stop an assassin, only known by the name of Fox, by the person who hired Fox! Kogoro accompanies his client on a hike, but other murders begin to occur!
10.TitleJapanese: 恐怖のトラヴァース殺人事件（前編）

11.TitleEnglish: The Fearful Mountain Trek Murder Case (2)
11.SummaryEnglish: There is more than one murderer on the hike! Kogoro apprehends the first killer, but the assassin Fox is still out there. What does the client who hired Fox and Kogoro have to hide?
11.TitleJapanese: 恐怖のトラヴァース殺人事件（後編）

12.TitleEnglish: The Legend of the Snow Woman
12.SummaryEnglish: Conan, Kogoro, and go on a ski trip and meet a famous movie star was threatened. When a suicide occurs, is there something more nefarious at work?
12.TitleJapanese: 雪女伝説殺人事件

13.TitleEnglish: The Murder Case of Kogoro's Date
13.SummaryEnglish: After an evening of drinking, Kogoro falls asleep on a train and meets Sachiko when he awakens and goes on a date with her. Before their date, she and Kogoro stop at her home, but she finds a person murdered!
13.TitleJapanese: 小五郎のデート殺人事件

14.TitleEnglish: Caught Up with the Great Detective! Two Murder Cases
14.SummaryEnglish: Case One: Kogoro was invited to a crime scene by the victim's wife hoping that Kogoro can find out the real murderer. The victim was a well known magician and one of his three students he is teaching murdered him! Ran starts to think Conan is really Shinichi since she took off Conan's glasses and notices he looks just like Shinichi! Conan has to find away out, or else everyone would be in danger! Just then Yukiko, Shinichi's mom comes by and sees Conan and Ran! Case Two: Yukiko takes Conan to her friends house. Late at night someone gets murdered! Now without Kogoro or Sonoko, who is Conan going to use to solve this case?
14.TitleJapanese: 追いつめられた名探偵！連続2大殺人事件

15.SummaryEnglish: A Company President hires Kogoro for 1 million Yen after hearing one of his children may attempt to kill him. Just when Conan thinks he has found the murderer, he is kidnapped himself!
15.TitleJapanese: 別れのワイン殺人事件

16.SummaryEnglish: A famous potter, who is a fan of Kogoro, invites his family over for the weekend. The next morning, they awaken to the potter’s son having committed suicide!
16.TitleJapanese: 名陶芸家殺人事件（前編）

17.SummaryEnglish: All signs point towards suicide. Yet, Conan refuses to believe it and searches for the truth behind it all.
17.TitleJapanese: 名陶芸家殺人事件（後編）

18.TitleEnglish: The Memories of the First Love Case (1)
18.SummaryEnglish: While attending a senpai’s birthday party, Ran and Sonoko learn their senpai, Asami Uchida, was in love with Shinichi. During the party, Asami falls asleep and the others depart for karaoke. After karaoke ends, they return to find the house on fire with Asami still in it!
18.TitleJapanese: 初恋の人想い出事件(前編)

19.TitleEnglish: The Memories of the First Love Case (2)
19.SummaryEnglish: Ran manages to save Asami from the burning house! Initial signs points towards attempted suicide, but Conan and the firefighters are puzzled about the placement of the birthday cake on a chair. Who from the birthday party attempted to kill Asami?
19.TitleJapanese: 初恋の人想い出事件(後編)

20.SummaryEnglish: A famous movie star hired Kogoro to learn about detective work for his upcoming role. When the actor’s wife revealed to be having and affair and found dead on her lovers balcony, Conan truly wonders if Kogoro was invited for another reason.
20.TitleJapanese: 時代劇俳優殺人事件(前編)

21.TitleEnglish: The Samurai Drama Murder Case (2)
21.SummaryEnglish: Two suspects: the husband and lover. Is the killer the movie star husband or is it the lover, the stunt double? Conan looks to see which is the murderer and who is innocent.
21.TitleJapanese: 時代劇俳優殺人事件(後編)

22.TitleEnglish: The Mysterious Robbers and Mansion Case (1)
22.SummaryEnglish: Kogoro is hired to solve a mystery surrounding a mansion filled with clocks! The clocks all go off at the same time, but one clock is different than the rest.
22.TitleJapanese: 盗賊団謎の洋館事件(前編)

23.TitleEnglish: The Mysterious Robbers and Mansion Case (2)
23.SummaryEnglish: One clock, which contains a Goblin instead of a cuckoo, leads Conan and Kogoro to believe the clients are looking for something other than what they have asked. Are they imposters or genuine?!
23.TitleJapanese: 盗賊団謎の洋館事件(後編)

24.TitleEnglish: The Murder Case of the Scoop Picture
24.SummaryEnglish: In what seems like more than a coincidence, a famous photographer was present when a reporter was killed in a fire. Conan believes it’s no mere coincidence and sets off to prove the photographer murdered the reporter!
24.TitleJapanese: スクープ写真殺人事件

1.SummaryEnglish: A client named Masao come to see Kogoro claiming that his sister has gone missing and he thinks she has been murdered.
1.TitleJapanese: モグラ星人謎の事件(前編)

2.TitleEnglish: The Mysterious Mole Alien Case (2)
2.SummaryEnglish: The police find Masao at Yoshikazu's house who buried the stolen jewels around the yard. The police are forced to excavate the yard, but they find no body....
2.TitleJapanese: モグラ星人謎の事件(後編)

3.TitleEnglish: The Great Detective Club Pursuit Case
3.SummaryEnglish: The Detective Boys solve another case and appear on the newspaper! Then while walking home after Kogoro invites the kids to eat, a red car hits Ayumi and takes off. Conan takes out his solar-powered skateboard and the Detective Boys chase after this person. For a while the red car disappears and then reappears and drives to the police station to turn himself in, but thats not all. While the pursuit was going on, a person of a company gets murdered and it happens to be that the man driving that car knew the victim. Is he the murderer? If so, can Conan and the others prove it?!
3.TitleJapanese: 探偵団大追跡事件

4.TitleEnglish: The Murder Case of the Cooking Classroom (1)
4.SummaryEnglish: Ran takes a French cuisine cooking lesson in Sonoko's absence and Conan and Kogoro tag along. After a blackout, the teacher is on the floor claiming to have trouble breathing and Conan discovers she's been punctured in the back. The police investigate and find evidence the attacker was someone from inside.
4.TitleJapanese: 料理教室殺人事件(前編)

5.TitleEnglish: The Murder Case of the Cooking Classroom (2)
5.SummaryEnglish: The four suspects is interrogated and searched. It seems everyone has a motive, but no evidence or murder weapon is found to pinpoint the killer.
5.TitleJapanese: 料理教室殺人事件(後編)

6.TitleEnglish: The Case of the Seven Mysteries of Teitan Elementary School
6.SummaryEnglish: Ayumi came to school one night to find a masked man. She told the vice-principal about it and he became absent for the last two days and the other teachers are acting suspicious.
6.TitleJapanese: 帝丹小７不思議事件

7.TitleEnglish: The Murder Case of the White Sands
7.SummaryEnglish: A young woman is found by a reef in what appears to be a suicide, but when information that the town's doctor had been intimate with her in the past is revealed, both Conan and Richard suspect that murder is really involved. Now the two must find the clues before his drinking alibi fully comes through.
7.TitleJapanese: 白い砂浜殺人事件

8.SummaryEnglish: Ran tricks her mother and father into going to the beach together. Kogoro, annoyed, leaves for the bathroom and returns with two girls named Kiwako Toda and Harumi Matsuzaki who invite the Mori family and Conan to lunch with the scuba diving club at the local college. After awhile, the group spots Kiwako drowning and rushes to save her.
8.TitleJapanese: スキューバダイビング殺人事件(前編)

9.SummaryEnglish: The Mori family, Conan, and the diving club members rush to the hospital where Kiwako is in intensive care. Conan and Eri is sure the events was an attempted murder
9.TitleJapanese: スキューバダイビング殺人事件(後編)

10.TitleEnglish: The Missing Mystery Writer Case (1)
10.SummaryEnglish: A young woman shows up at the detective agency asking Detective Mori to find her father, a mystery writer, who vanished two months ago along with his wife. The only clue to his whereabouts is a piece found in his latest publication, but can Conan and the others solve the code?
10.TitleJapanese: ミステリー作家失踪事件(前編)

11.SummaryEnglish: In continuation from the last case, the search for the mystery writer continues. Conan and the others must decipher the code in his text in order to solve the mystery of his and his wife's disappearance two months ago. Will Conan be able to do help them do this without blowing his cover?
11.TitleJapanese: ミステリー作家失踪事件(後編)

12.SummaryEnglish: Hattori Heiji invites Kogoro, Ran, and of course Conan to Osaka. Heiji takes them around the city and soon bumps into Kazuha, Heiji's friend. Kazuha who meets Ran mistakes Ran for Heiji's girlfriend and also thinks Ran is Kudo, the name that Heiji has mentioned to her. Heiji laughs at Kazuha and says that the Kudo he was talking about was a boy, Kudo Shinichi, the famous high school detective who had shrunk into Edogawa Conan. Heiji who had promised not to tell anyone that Conan was really Shinichi kept his mouth shut even to Kazuha. Conan was freaked out when Kazuha said 'Kudo'. Later 2 people get murdered and its up to Conan and Heiji to solve the case!
12.TitleJapanese: 浪花の連続殺人事件

13.SummaryEnglish: Conan and the gang attend a Kamen Rider costume party. In a duel between a Yaiba cos-player and staff, both shoot their guns, but only one bullet kills. Is there more to this case than what everyone saw with their own two eyes?
13.TitleJapanese: 仮面ヤイバー殺人事件

14.SummaryEnglish: Kogoro is invited to a mountain house by a previous client named Hiromi Yamazaki who wishes Kogoro to help with the announcement of a spa resort. While Kogoro is looking out the window, Hiromi falls from the second floor and is announced dead.
14.TitleJapanese: ハニーカクテル殺人事件

15.SummaryEnglish: Conan, Ran, and Kogoro are on their way to a Yōko concert when Kogoro discovers he lost his ticket. He overhears a woman named Masayo on the payphone and her situation about a friend who is unable to go to the concert because of a cold. Kogoro asks her for the spare ticket and she accepts as long as Kogoro drives her to her house to pick up her sister, but they find Masayo's sister dead.
15.TitleJapanese: バスルーム密室事件(前編)

16.SummaryEnglish: The victim's fiancé busts in and tells the police he was ringing the door bell the day before because the victim missed an appointment. Conan knocks out Kogoro, reveals the identity of the murderer....
16.TitleJapanese: バスルーム密室事件(後編)

17.SummaryEnglish: Aki Asano, the weather girl for the local news, leaves a message for Kogoro's assistance. Kogoro is away because of business so the Detective Boys go instead to discover Aki has been getting threatening letters. Conan gives Aki his pager number just before she receives an urgent phone call and asks the Detective Boys to wait for her.....
17.TitleJapanese: お天気お姉さん誘拐事件

18.SummaryEnglish: Seiji Ishimoto, president of an electronic company, claims he has been receiving threat letters and hires Kogoro as a bodyguard.
18.TitleJapanese: 謎の狙撃者殺人事件(前編)

19.SummaryEnglish: Investigation into the minister's assassination continues.
19.TitleJapanese: 謎の狙撃者殺人事件(後編)

20.SummaryEnglish: The scriptwriter for the Drama Traveling Troupe's is found dead. Aside from the murder, a disc was also stolen. What was on the disc?
20.TitleJapanese: 旅芝居一座殺人事件(前編)

21.TitleEnglish: The Traveling Drama Murder Case (2)
21.SummaryEnglish: The disc is found in the director’s room, but it is empty. The Director was knocked out on stage and the treasurer was pushed to her death. Conan realizes only two people had time to kill the scriptwriter.
21.TitleJapanese: 旅芝居一座殺人事件(後編)

22.TitleEnglish: The Black Corps One Billion Yen Robbery Case
22.SummaryEnglish: Conan meets Akemi Miyano, who has stolen money to free her the Black Organization. However, they betray her and Conan learns more about the existence of the Black Organization with her dying breath.
22.TitleJapanese: 黒の組織10億円強奪事件

23.TitleEnglish: A University Professor and the Girl Who Came From the Black Organization
23.SummaryEnglish: A new student named Ai Haibara comes to Conan's class and at that same day, a boy's brother was kidnapped. The brother asking the Detective Boys for help, decide to help find his brother...only it leads to something with something quite interesting.
23.TitleJapanese: 黒の組織から来た女 大学教授殺人事件

24.SummaryEnglish: On New Years day there was a soccer game taking place in Tokyo and the Detective Boys including the new member, Ai Haibara got to watch the game. During the game the TV station was forced to aim the camera below where the Detective Boys were sitting and where the soccer ball was. Then the soccer ball jumped up and deflated. Conan jumps down and realizes that the ball was shot by a gun with a silencer on it. The caller who forced the station to aim the camera also forces them to pay huge amounts of money or else, someone dies!
24.TitleJapanese: 競技場無差別脅迫事件（前編）

25.SummaryEnglish: The police has found one of the accomplices who took the bag of money the police put there. But then with the person's cell phone on, the other person hears what has happened and threatens to kill someone if the police doesn't let his accomplice go. The police releases him and the TV station was forced again to pay more money that was impossible to get before the soccer game ends. Conan realizes that this person has planned to kill someone in the first place and knows he has to find this person before one gets hurt! But with millions of people in the stadium, is it really possible to find this person before the game ends?
25.TitleJapanese: 競技場無差別脅迫事件（後編）

26.SummaryEnglish: Kogoro and Conan drop Sonoko and Ran off at meeting full of magicians. On their way home, they learn one of the magicians was murdered and hurry back!
26.TitleJapanese: 奇術愛好家殺人事件（事件篇）

27.SummaryEnglish: A strangled body appears in the snow, but there are no footprints around it. Is it magic?! As members of the club search the house, two arrows are shot through windows.
27.TitleJapanese: 奇術愛好家殺人事件（疑惑篇）

28.SummaryEnglish: Conan realizes the trick behind the crossbow attack and uses Sonoko to solve the case. But that’s not all, Kaito Kid is lurking around!
28.TitleJapanese: 奇術愛好家殺人事件（解決篇）

1.TitleEnglish: The Search for the Disappearing Weapon Case
1.SummaryEnglish: Conan and the Detective Boys find Ayumi’s hairdresser dead, strangled. With evidence, they find out a blue hangar was used, but was likely thrown away. Can they find it before the trash is disposed of?
1.TitleJapanese: 消えた凶器捜索事件

2.TitleEnglish: The Old Castle Investigation Case (1)
2.SummaryEnglish: Professor Agasa takes the Detective Boys camping, but he forgets the tent! As they look for shelter, they wander into a castle. Inside, Conan finds a hidden passageway, but is knocked out by someone hiding inside! Professor Agasa and Haibara realize something has happened to him when they cannot find him.
2.TitleJapanese: 青の古城探索事件（前編）

3.TitleEnglish: The Old Castle Investigation Case (2)
3.SummaryEnglish: The Detective Boys locate the hidden passageway later that night. They discover a body and realize the house’s mistress has been the disguised culprit all along. Once they discover Conan, he reveals the treasure and captures the culprit.
3.TitleJapanese: 青の古城探索事件（後編）

4.TitleEnglish: The Final Screening Murder Case (1)
4.SummaryEnglish: The Detective Boys attend a triple-feature of Gomera during the final day of a theatre before it is destroyed. During the second film, the man is found hanged. The four theater employees become the main suspects.
4.TitleJapanese: 最後の上映殺人事件（前編）

5.SummaryEnglish: With a clue from Mitsuhiko, Conan finds out the clue to this murder is the mirrors. Will the murder deduction be the theater’s last show ever?
5.TitleJapanese: 最後の上映殺人事件（後編）

6.TitleEnglish: SOS! A Messages From Ayumi
6.SummaryEnglish: Ayumi is sick and is at home with a sore throat. Her mom left the house to go somewhere and a daring thief breaks into Ayumi's house hoping to find money. Ayumi has to warn Conan and the others through her Detective Boys Communication Badge without making a sound since she might alert the thief and that she has a sore throat. Will Conan and the Detective Boys save Ayumi in time?
6.TitleJapanese: SOS！歩美からのメッセージ

7.TitleEnglish: The Night Before the Wedding Locked Room Murder Case (1)
7.SummaryEnglish: While visiting Kogoro, Ran, and Conan in Tokyo, Heiji and Kazuha also run into his father and friend, who invites the group back to his home. While there, his father’s friend is stabbed in the heart!
7.TitleJapanese: 結婚前夜の密室事件（前編）

8.TitleEnglish: The Night Before the Wedding Locked Room Murder Case (2)
8.SummaryEnglish: Heiji and Conan stage an arrest to lure out the real culprit, who returns for the murder weapon.
8.TitleJapanese: 結婚前夜の密室事件（後編）

9.SummaryEnglish: Sonoko and Ran go to an observatory looking for shooting stars. While they are there, someone falls from the observatory and dies.
9.TitleJapanese: 疑惑の天体観測

10.TitleEnglish: The North Star #3 Express Leaving Ueno (1)
10.SummaryEnglish: While traveling via the North Star Express to Hokkaido, a robbery turned murder occurs on the train. The murder feels very familiar to Conan, right out of one of his father’s novels!
10.TitleJapanese: 上野発北斗星３号（前編）

11.TitleEnglish: The North Star #3 Express Leaving Ueno (2)
11.SummaryEnglish: Conan’s mother is on the train as well and he discusses the case with her. As the train arrives at it’s destination without the culprit caught, Yusaku makes an appearance to reveal the trick.
11.TitleJapanese: 上野発北斗星３号（後編）

12.TitleEnglish: The Metropolitan Police Detective Love Story (1)
12.SummaryEnglish: The Detective Boys visit the police station. While there, they overhear a phone call where someone screams. Once they arrive, a bank owner’s wife is found murdered!
12.TitleJapanese: 本庁の刑事恋物語（前編）

13.TitleEnglish: The Metropolitan Police Detective Love Story (2)
13.SummaryEnglish: Conan helps the Metropolitan Police solve the murder and bank robbery. Takagi and Sato feelings are explored for the first time
13.TitleJapanese: 本庁の刑事恋物語（後編）

14.SummaryEnglish: Early in the morning, the Detective Boys go to see a train. What appears to be an accident turns into a deadly distraction as someone falls onto the tracks, but wasn’t the one who die
14.TitleJapanese: 路面電車急停止事件

15.TitleEnglish: The Amusement Park Bungee Jumping Case
15.SummaryEnglish: An accident happens during a Kamen Yaiba play at the amusement park and the actor is found dead at the bottom of the pool.
15.TitleJapanese: 遊園地バンジー事件

16.TitleEnglish: The Truth of the Exploding Car Case (1)
16.SummaryEnglish: Kogoro goes to visit one of the students he used to tutor, but upon arrival a car explodes in the driveway!
16.TitleJapanese: 自動車爆発事件の真相（前編）

17.TitleEnglish: The Truth of the Exploding Car Case (2)
17.SummaryEnglish: With Conan’s help, Kogoro is able to solve the case on his own. He realizes the killer is closer than he thought…
17.TitleJapanese: 自動車爆発事件の真相（後編）

18.TitleEnglish: The Mysterious Old Man Disappearance Case
18.SummaryEnglish: Ran meets an old man on the bus, who slips a disc into her purse. She tries to find him, but he disappeared! The same culprits kidnap Sonoko and Conan discovers where they are hiding.

19.SummaryEnglish: While on a trip to the beach Ran, Sonoko, and Conan learn there is a serial killer after brown-haired girls. Later that night, Sonoko is attacked and the culprit desperately searches for her camera. What is on the camera?
19.TitleJapanese: 園子のアブない夏物語（前編）

20.SummaryEnglish: Sonoko appears to be the killer’s target. Can Sonoko be saved in time? Who is there to help Conan?
20.TitleJapanese: 園子のアブない夏物語（後編）

21.TitleEnglish: The Underwater Locked Room Case
21.SummaryEnglish: Kogoro, Ran, and Conan visit with an old woman and her grandson, but when they arrive he’s found dead in a locked bathroom.

22.TitleEnglish: Metropolitan Police Detective Love Story 2 (1)
22.SummaryEnglish: Detective Sato pursues a possible murderer through a building and accidentally handcuffs herself and the culprit to a toilet. It’s up to Takagi and the Detective Boys to help.
22.TitleJapanese: 本庁の刑事恋物語２（前編）

23.SummaryEnglish: Takagi and the Detective Boys solve the case, but will they make it in time to save Sato before the building is blown up?
23.TitleJapanese: 本庁の刑事恋物語２（後編）

24.SummaryEnglish: While traveling home, a group of coworkers all get on a train together, but one of them is found dead. With Conan and Kogoro as witnesses, they need evidence to find the killer.
24.TitleJapanese: 沈黙の環状線

25.TitleEnglish: Bizarre! The Legend of the Five Storied Pagoda (1)
25.SummaryEnglish: While visiting a 5-story pagoda, the manager turns up dead, hanging from the top floor. Is it suicide or as the legend predicted, a murder?
25.TitleJapanese: 怪奇五重塔伝説（前編）

26.TitleEnglish: Bizarre! The Legend of the Five Storied Pagoda (2)
26.SummaryEnglish: Conan finds evidence that the rope was tampered with. Can Conan solve the case before it is deemed a suicide?
26.TitleJapanese: 怪奇五重塔伝説（後編）

27.SummaryEnglish: Conan, Kogoro, and Ran are out to eat at a fancy restaurant with a stream that little boats carrying food sail to the rooms they are supposed to deliver the food to. After a while three men enter the restaurant, then after eating a woman screams and Kogoro, Conan, and Ran rush to the frightened women, pointing at a dead person. How was the murder done? And why was the victim in the room he wasn't supposed to be in?
27.TitleJapanese: 流水亭に流れる殺意

28.TitleEnglish: The Case of the Flying Locked Room, Shinichi Kudo's First Case
28.SummaryEnglish: Conan recalls his first ever murder case, solved as Shinichi, while he was on a plane.
28.TitleJapanese: 空飛ぶ密室 工藤新一最初の事件

1.TitleEnglish: The Secret of the Moon, the Star, and the Sun (part 1)
1.SummaryEnglish: Professor Agasa takes the Detective Boys to an abandoned house for a day of puzzle solving. But when the clues he hid are found broken, Conan realizes someone is living there.
1.TitleJapanese: 月と星と太陽の秘密（前編）

2.TitleEnglish: The Secret of the Moon, the Star, and the Sun (part 2)
2.SummaryEnglish: Conan discovers an attic in the house, with a dead body. Another man appears and reveals he has been using the house for counterfeiting.
2.TitleJapanese: 月と星と太陽の秘密（後編）

3.TitleEnglish: The Case of the Disappearing Detective Boys
3.SummaryEnglish: The Detective Boys are on a camping trip to practice for the school puppet play! However, a serial killer has been spotted not far from the camp!
3.TitleJapanese: 少年探偵団消失事件

4.TitleEnglish: The Monster of the Tottori Spider Mansion (Part One: The Murder)
4.SummaryEnglish: Kogoro and Heiji are both hired to solve a mystery in Tottori. A mansion is supposedly haunted by the Demon Spider God and his first hanging victim has been found.
4.TitleJapanese: 鳥取クモ屋敷の怪（事件編）

5.TitleEnglish: The Monster of the Tottori Spider Mansion (Part Two: The Suspicion)
5.SummaryEnglish: The Demon Spider God continues to hang people. A note is left saying Kazuha will be hung next, can Conan and Heiji save her in time?
5.TitleJapanese: 鳥取クモ屋敷の怪（疑惑編）

6.TitleEnglish: The Monster of the Tottori Spider Mansion (Part Three: The Solution)
6.SummaryEnglish: The culprit is caught thanks to Conan and Heiji who hung those he blamed for not stopping his girlfriend from hanging herself, but what did the killer miss?
6.TitleJapanese: 鳥取クモ屋敷の怪（解決編）

7.SummaryEnglish: When Mouri visits an aquarium. While watching a play, instead of the actress appearing out of the clam, a body floats up from the water.
7.TitleJapanese: ビーナスのキッス

8.TitleEnglish: The Unseen Angle of the Darkness (part 1)
8.SummaryEnglish: While visiting a doctor at his house, a blackout occurs. When the lights come back on, a man is found dead in the bath tub.
8.TitleJapanese: 暗闇の中の死角（前編）

9.TitleEnglish: The Unseen Angle of the Darkness (part 2)
9.SummaryEnglish: Conan investigates around the house and finds a timer on the fusebox. Who murdered the doctor?!
9.TitleJapanese: 暗闇の中の死角（後編）

10.TitleEnglish: The Revival of the Dying Message (part 1)
10.SummaryEnglish: A woman is found dead at Tropical Land in the woman’s bathroom with a dying message: “S smeared in blood and KIX on her phone”
10.TitleJapanese: よみがえる死の伝言(ﾀﾞｲｲﾝｸﾞ・ﾒｯｾｰｼﾞ)(前編)

11.TitleEnglish: The Revival of the Dying Message (part 2)
11.SummaryEnglish: Conan determines the “S” was a dying message left by the culprit and “KIX” is the real message.
11.TitleJapanese: よみがえる死の伝言(ﾀﾞｲｲﾝｸﾞ・ﾒｯｾｰｼﾞ)(後編)

12.TitleEnglish: The 20 Year old Murder Case: The Symphony Serial Murders
12.SummaryEnglish: Part 1: Kana Amusement group is putting out a new CD for pianist Tenma Gerald and is holding a party for the release of the CD. However, the wife of the company president, Kana Yoshinori, has been receiving some threatening letters and crank phone calls. Whoever is sending the letters is aware of the party which is to be a private affair. Who could be responsible for these cranks and why are they threatening Kana Misaki? It's up to Conan, with Mouri Kogorou and Ran in tow to solve the mystery at hand. Posing as the Yoshinori's childhood friends, the three pose as the Morita family in order to hide their true identity. Afterall, it wouldn't do to know that the famous detective Mouri Kogorou were present at a contract signing party. At the party, we are introduced to the company heads of Kana Amusement Group who, despite being related, seem at times to barely be civil with each other.
12.TitleJapanese: 二十年目の殺意　シンフォニー号連続殺人事件

13.TitleEnglish: The Man Who Was Killed Four Times
13.SummaryEnglish: It appears that following the murder of Komiyama, three people stepped forward as the murderer. However, which one of the three is the actual murderer? Katsumata Kengo, Niikura Yumiko, and Hoshino Hariyuki all had a motive, and when questioned by the police, all three admitted to the murder. Katsumata Kengo struck him over the head with a vase after being angered by the man and moved his body into the utility closet. However, Hoshino Haruyuki likewise admitted to murdering the man after being told that Yumiko would never be his by Komiyama and then hit him over the head with... a vase. While at school, Niikura Yumiko admits that Komiyama made a pass at her and came after her at the school and getting frightened, struck him over the head... with a vase. So who is the actual killer?!? It's up to Conan to help Mouri Kogorou and the police solve the case of the four times killed man.
13.TitleJapanese: 四回殺された男

14.TitleEnglish: Meeting with the Black Organization Again (part 1)
14.SummaryEnglish: Conan and Haibara see Gin’s car while walking home from school and Conan is able to place a tracker on it. Gin discovers the tracker though and suspects that Sherry (Haibara) is still alive.
14.TitleJapanese: 黒の組織との再会（灰原編）

15.TitleEnglish: Meeting with the Black Organization Again (part 2)
15.SummaryEnglish: A murder occurs at Haido City Hotel. Conan discovers that the Black Organization is responsible – Pisco is there. In the commotion of the murder, Haibara is kidnapped. Can Conan save her before the Black Organization finds her?
15.TitleJapanese: 黒の組織との再会（コナン編）

16.TitleEnglish: Meeting with the Black Organization Again (part 3)
16.SummaryEnglish: Haibara is trapped in the same building as Gin and Vodka. Conan is able to help her, but the Black Organization now knows she is alive.
16.TitleJapanese: 黒の組織との再会（解決編）

17.TitleEnglish: The Case of the Coffee Shop Truck's Wild Entrance
17.SummaryEnglish: Conan is at a coffee shop when one man is killed by a truck running through the front. What happened to the other man who was with him?
17.TitleJapanese: 喫茶店トラック乱入事件

18.TitleEnglish: The Nocturne of the Red Murderous Intent (Part One)
18.SummaryEnglish: A client hires Kogoro to find his wife’s stalker. At a party, a blackout occurs and someone attempts to grab the client’s wife.
18.TitleJapanese: 赤い殺意の夜想曲 （ノクターン）（前編）

19.TitleEnglish: The Nocturne of the Red Murderous Intent (Part Two)
19.SummaryEnglish: Conan discovers Red Nocturne has to do with the impaled man just murdered. Was it the stalker?
19.TitleJapanese: 赤い殺意の夜想曲（ノクターン）（後編）

20.TitleEnglish: The Big Investigation of the Nine Doors
20.SummaryEnglish: The Detective Boys stumble on an SOS sign. Is it a false alarm or is someone hiding something?
20.TitleJapanese: 大捜索九つのドア

21.TitleEnglish: A Dangerous Recipe
21.SummaryEnglish: The Detective Boys stumble on to a receipt with a dangerous combination of items on it. It’s up to them to find the culprit in time.

22.TitleEnglish: The cursed Mask laughs coldly
22.SummaryEnglish: Kogoro is invited to a car accident charity, but a message from the Phantom of the Cursed Masks warns them not to go. Why have so many people gathered in one mansion and what do all of the masks mean?
22.TitleJapanese: 呪いの仮面は冷たく笑う

23.SummaryEnglish: Kogoro is nearly killed by an arrow while driving. When they arrive at the hotel, a dead actor has just been found!
23.TitleJapanese: 殺された名探偵（前編）

24.SummaryEnglish: Several people are staying in the hotel, but Kogoro thinks it is the work of an outsider. Conan discovers what the culprit really did, using a modified crossbow.
24.TitleJapanese: 殺された名探偵（後編）

25.TitleEnglish: The Unknown Gunshot That Rings In The Dark
25.SummaryEnglish: While Kogoro is at a client’s house, the woman is murdered. The suspects are the only other guests in her house: her son, daughter, and the maid.
25.TitleJapanese: 闇に響く謎の銃声

26.TitleEnglish: Desperate Revival: Cavern Of The Detective Boys
26.SummaryEnglish: The Detective Boys stumble onto a group of robbers with a dead body while camping. Conan helps the Detective Boys get away, but he is shot in the process!
26.TitleJapanese: 命がけの復活 　洞窟の探偵団

27.TitleEnglish: Desperate Revival: The Wounded Famous Detective
27.SummaryEnglish: The Detective Boys escaped and helped the police arrest the gang. Conan goes into surgery after being shot, but Ran suspects he really is Shinichi! Haibara helps Conan divert suspicion.
27.TitleJapanese: 命がけの復活 　負傷した名探偵

28.SummaryEnglish: Heiji helps Shinichi by disguising as him to distract Ran from noticing Conan’s identity. Ran is playing the school heroine when a murder at school occurs!
28.TitleJapanese: 命がけの復活 　第三の選択

29.TitleEnglish: Desperate Revival: The Black Cloaked Knight
29.SummaryEnglish: Shinichi returns to his regular body and appears as the Black Knight to save the case, but collapses from a fever.
29.TitleJapanese: 命がけの復活 　黒衣の騎士

30.SummaryEnglish: Having returned to his normal body, Shinichi takes Ran out to dinner. Shinichi attempts to make a confession to Ran, but a murder occurs
30.TitleJapanese: 命がけの復活 　帰ってきた新一…

31.SummaryEnglish: Shinichi quickly solves the case, but his body gives out and returns to Conan before he had the chance to confess to Ran.
31.TitleJapanese: 命がけの復活 　約束の場所

1.SummaryEnglish: Conan begs Haibara for an antidote to return him to his normal body, but it is not permanent. Later, a woman requests Kogoro discover the owner of a music box. When visiting their house, Ran and Haruna see an old man’s shadow fly by and someone was attacked!
1.TitleJapanese: 意味深なオルゴール（前編）

2.TitleEnglish: The Significant Music Box (part 2)
2.SummaryEnglish: The family reveals the deceased grandfather hid stamps worth a fortune. Conan and Kogoro help solve the case and find the lost treasure!
2.TitleJapanese: 意味深なオルゴール（後編）

3.TitleEnglish: The Invisible Weapon, Ran's First Investigations
3.SummaryEnglish: Conan, Ran, and Sonoko are out to eat at a café and befriend a couple. Something seems strange about the couple to Ran, so she goes to visit them and learns something unsettling.
3.TitleJapanese: 見えない凶器 蘭の初推理

4.TitleEnglish: A Super Car's Trap (part 1)
4.SummaryEnglish: While attending a car show to investigate a death threat, a man is found killed by carbon monoxide-intoxication.
4.TitleJapanese: スーパーカーの罠（前編）

5.SummaryEnglish: Conan figures out the trick the culprit used to direct the fumes into the car and is able to figure out which of the many suspects it is.
5.TitleJapanese: スーパーカーの罠（後編）

6.TitleEnglish: Kogoro Mouri, Suspect (part 1)
6.SummaryEnglish: Kogoro, Ran, and Conan are staying at a hotel when they run into Kogoro’s estranged wife, Eri Kirisaki. Eri is at the hotel with colleagues of hers. Kogoro is upset seeing Eri around another man and proceeds to get drunk. He is later found in the bed of Eri’s female colleage, who has been murdered!
6.TitleJapanese: 容疑者・毛利小五郎（前編）

7.SummaryEnglish: Prime Suspect, Mouri Kogoro, who was found in the room with a dead body. With the help of Conan, Eri, and the police, they use a trick to lure out the real culprit and clear Kogoro’s name.
7.TitleJapanese: 容疑者・毛利小五郎（後編）

8.SummaryEnglish: A man dies right in front of Conan, Kogoro, and Ran while riding on a bus. What does a past murder on the bus have to do with this one?
8.TitleJapanese: 10人目の乗客（前編）

9.SummaryEnglish: A murder from 7 years ago pops up when people who rode on the same bus start being murdered. Can Conan stop the bus before it plunges off a cliff?
9.TitleJapanese: 10人目の乗客（後編）

10.TitleEnglish: The Black Wings of Icarus (part 1)
10.SummaryEnglish: While at a hotel, Kogoro, Ran, and Conan run into some old acquaintances. While there, an actress is also staying at the hotel, but the next morning she is found hung in her room.
10.TitleJapanese: 黒いイカロスの翼（前編）

11.SummaryEnglish: Conan rules out a suicide after seeing the crime scene, but can he find who managed to sneak into the room and kill the actress?
11.TitleJapanese: 黒いイカロスの翼（後編）

12.TitleEnglish: The Metropolitan Police Detective Love Story 3 (part 1)
12.SummaryEnglish: Somebody is setting fires across the city! Takagi and Sato are assigned to the case, but Sato is distracted by something else. Can the Detective Boys help them solve it?
12.TitleJapanese: 本庁の刑事恋物語3（前編）

13.TitleEnglish: The Metropolitan Police Detective Love Story 3 (part 2)
13.SummaryEnglish: The Detective Boys discover the pattern of arson and manage to find the arsonist, but the final burning warehouse contains a handcuffed Takagi! Can Sato resolve a past problem relating to her father’s death and save Takagi?
13.TitleJapanese: 本庁の刑事恋物語3（後編）

14.TitleEnglish: The Deduction That Was Too Good
14.SummaryEnglish: While walking home from the bar drunk, Kogoro witnesses a fight between two men. The next day, one of them was murdered and the other begs Kogoro to prove his innocence, but something about his alibi is too perfect.
14.TitleJapanese: 見事すぎた名推理

15.TitleEnglish: The Entrance to the Maze: The Anger of the Colossus
15.SummaryEnglish: An opening ceremony for a ropeway built through a giant Goddess Statue on the mountains is being held. After the first ride, tourist company president rides through, he disappears. His body is found dead on the Statue’s hand.
15.TitleJapanese: 迷宮への入口　巨大神像の怒り

16.TitleEnglish: The Falling from Mt. Ryushin Case
16.SummaryEnglish: A car is rammed off a mountain and seems like a basic case, but the Detective Boys find a code. Can they solve this while trying to hide the code from Conan?
16.TitleJapanese: 龍神山転落事件

17.TitleEnglish: The Water Palace of Five Colors (Part One)
17.SummaryEnglish: Kogoro, Ran, and Conan attend a tea meeting at the Aonogi family house in place of Sonoko and her father. Behind the house is a pond that changes colors. When the group crosses the pond to the tearoom on the other side, the headmaster is found hung!
17.TitleJapanese: 五彩伝説の水御殿（前編）

18.TitleEnglish: The Water Palace of Five Colors (Part Two)
18.SummaryEnglish: What does the pond have to do with the murder? Conan figures out how the killer hung the victim while not being present.
18.TitleJapanese: 五彩伝説の水御殿（後編）

19.TitleEnglish: Mushrooms, Bears, and the Detective Boys (Part One)
19.SummaryEnglish: The Detective Boys are out looking for mushrooms in the forest. Genta sees good mushrooms on the other side of a fence, which marks the animal hunting area. On the hunting side, a man is found dead.
19.TitleJapanese: きのこと熊と探偵団（前編）

20.TitleEnglish: Mushrooms, Bears, and the Detective Boys (Part Two)
20.SummaryEnglish: Bear hunters are in search of a legendary bear. Conan decides to follow the murderer to see why he killed a man, but does not try to harm anyone else.
20.TitleJapanese: きのこと熊と探偵団（後編）

21.TitleEnglish: The Mysterious Retro Room Case
21.SummaryEnglish: A murder occurs in a retro hotel room at Dolphinland. Why is there an ice cream bar, candies, pepper spray and a coin-operated television in the room?
21.TitleJapanese: レトロルームの謎事件

22.TitleEnglish: The Bay of Revenge (Part One)
22.SummaryEnglish: Kogoro has a lawyer client who is receiving death letters from someone with the initials “T.K.”. When the lawyer ends up dead and a man with the initials “T.K.” was a former client of the lawyer, the prime suspect is found. However, when they arrive at his house, he is also dead.
22.TitleJapanese: ベイ・オブ・ザ・リベンジ（前編）

23.SummaryEnglish: Conan discovers a clue linking the murdered lawyer, Kensuke Tachibana, and his former client “Tatsuya Kumada”, both with a “T” and “K” in their initials.
23.TitleJapanese: ベイ・オブ・ザ・リベンジ（後編）

24.SummaryEnglish: When Kogoro and Conan are waiting for Ran and Sonoko to finish shopping, Kogoro spots an attractive woman coming out of the phone booth. Conan spots a pen inside the booth, and tells Kogoro. Immediately Kogoro gets the pen and reaches to touch the woman--boom! Kogoro is knocked to the ground. Actually, the attractive lady was Satou-san in disguise! They were trying to capture the person who was attacking ""101 spice girls"". Sonoko comes to join Kogoro, but Ran stayed to get something else. Miraculously Ran winds up in the parking lot of the shopping mall and spots a body by a car--a dead ""101 spice girl"".
24.TitleJapanese: 封印された目暮の秘密（前編）

25.SummaryEnglish: Inspection follows. It is found that the victim had been involved in a car crash a year ago, in the same parking lot. Using information from the previous three victims, Conan figures that the murderer's motive was probably because of the high-top shoes that ""101 spice girls"" all wear. It if found, then, that the main cause of the victim's car crash was because of her shoes. They weakened the pedal's reaction. After Kogoro and Megure finally get the point (with Conan hinting), they figure out the murderer, but now he's gone! And now Sonoko, wearing a pair of high-top shoes, is stuck in the shopping mall... with the revengeful murderer!
25.TitleJapanese: 封印された目暮の秘密（後編）

26.TitleEnglish: The Gathering of the Detectives! Kudo Shinichi vs Kaito Kid!
26.SummaryEnglish: Kaitou Kid reminisces over the time he was almost caught by Shinichi Kudo. A detective meeting as been called by an unknown person using Kaitou Kid’s name. As the detectives become stranded in the mansion, one is murdered.
26.TitleJapanese: 集められた名探偵！工藤新一ＶＳ怪盗キッド

1.TitleEnglish: The Client Full of Lies (Part One)
1.SummaryEnglish: An old but pretty woman comes in Kogoro's office, asking him to find the address of her first love. Kogoro gets very interested in her,and Conan quickly finds out the address. Conan is also suspicious about this woman because he noticed that she kept telling lies-- saying that she wasn't married when her ring finger was thinner and saying that she never cooked when she could recognize different kinds of fish just by looking at the gills. But when they arrive, they find an open door. And the open door revealed a bloody crime scene-- the woman's first love lies dead on the floor.
1.TitleJapanese: 偽りだらけの依頼人（前編）

2.TitleEnglish: The Client Full of Lies (Part Two)
2.SummaryEnglish: The victim is holding a picture of Kogoro’s client – does that make her the prime suspect?! What else is the client hiding from Conan and Kogoro?
2.TitleJapanese: 偽りだらけの依頼人（後編）

3.TitleEnglish: And Then There Were No Mermaids (Part One: The Murder)
3.SummaryEnglish: Conan, Ran, Heiji, Kazuha, and Kogoro go to the Isle of Mermaids at the request of a client.
3.TitleJapanese: そして人魚はいなくなった（事件編）

4.TitleEnglish: And Then There Were No Mermaids (Part Two: The Deduction)
4.SummaryEnglish: A festival turns sour when one of the contestants is found dead in a waterfall. Conan awaits Heiji’s assistance to reveal the culprit, but Heiji and Kazhua are pushed off a cliff!
4.TitleJapanese: そして人魚はいなくなった（推理編）

5.TitleEnglish: And Then There Were No Mermaids (Part Three: The Solution)
5.SummaryEnglish: Conan confronts the culprit. A tragic town secret leads to a grave misunderstanding.
5.TitleJapanese: そして人魚はいなくなった（解決編）

6.TitleEnglish: The Secret of the High Sales
6.SummaryEnglish: A boy comes to the Detective Boys with a case. A new employee at his family’s shop is acting suspicious!
6.TitleJapanese: 商売繁盛のヒミツ

7.SummaryEnglish: Ran and Sonoko run into their new English teacher, Jodie, at an arcade. While talking with their teacher, a man is murdered while playing video games.
7.TitleJapanese: バトルゲームの罠（前編）

8.SummaryEnglish: Jodie acts suspicious towards Conan’s young appearance and good reasoning ability. Conan figures out the game trick!
8.TitleJapanese: バトルゲームの罠（後編）

9.SummaryEnglish: A man is killed during a pottery class. The culprit is evident, but no evidence can be found.
9.TitleJapanese: 殺意の陶芸教室（前編）

10.TitleEnglish: The Murderous Pottery Class (Part Two)
10.SummaryEnglish: Once the police arrive, Conan is able to reveal the culprit. Ran and Sonoko make pottery for their beloveds.
10.TitleJapanese: 殺意の陶芸教室（後編）

11.SummaryEnglish: The Detective Boys run into Jodie-sensei and Araide-sensei on a bus. Haiabara senses a member of the Black Organization on the bus when it is hijacked.
11.TitleJapanese: 謎めいた乗客（前編）

12.SummaryEnglish: With Jodie’s help, Conan is able to prevent the busjacking, but the bombs can’t be stopped. After the bus is evacuated, Conan realizes there is still someone on the bus: Haibara!
12.TitleJapanese: 謎めいた乗客（後編）

13.TitleEnglish: The Falling Off The Condo Case
13.SummaryEnglish: Conan and Kogoro are with a man when his roommate falls from their condo to his death. Was it coincidence or a clever murder?
13.TitleJapanese: マンション転落事件

14.TitleEnglish: The Evidence That Didn't Disappear (Part One)
14.SummaryEnglish: Professor Agasa takes the Detective Boys to a neighbor’s. Someone appears to have stolen the neighbor’s dog!
14.TitleJapanese: 消えなかった証拠（前編）

15.TitleEnglish: The Evidence That Didn't Disappear (Part Two)
15.SummaryEnglish: The Detective Boys search the house for clues for the missing dog. When the grandfather clock does not chime as inspected, it gets a closer look.
15.TitleJapanese: 消えなかった証拠（後編）

16.SummaryEnglish: A body turns up inside a locked wine cellar! How did the killer manage to get out of a room locked from the inside?
16.TitleJapanese: 密室のワインセラー

17.TitleEnglish: The Nanki Beach Mystery Tour (Part One)
17.SummaryEnglish: While on vacation in Shirahama, Conan and group meet students from an art club that do not seem to get along well.
17.TitleJapanese: 南紀白浜ミステリーツアー（前編）

18.TitleEnglish: The Nanki Beach Mystery Tour (Part Two)
18.SummaryEnglish: One of the art students is found stabbed in the heart. What is this art club group hiding?
18.TitleJapanese: 南紀白浜ミステリーツアー（後編）

19.SummaryEnglish: Heiji invites Conan to Osaka for the opening of a restaurant with many celebrities present. A gunshot rings out during the opening and a news reporter has been shot dead.
19.TitleJapanese: 大阪“３つのK”事件（前編）

20.SummaryEnglish: A boxer, a baseball player, and a soccer player. One of these three men shot the news reporter. What is bothering Conan?
20.TitleJapanese: 大阪“３つのK”事件（後編）

21.TitleEnglish: The Bullet Train Transport Case (Part One)
21.SummaryEnglish: Conan and Ran are returning from Osaka. Takagi and Sato are also on the train investigating a bomb.

22.TitleEnglish: The Bullet Train Transport Case (Part Two)
22.SummaryEnglish: The bomb was a decoy. A drug dealer is found murdered in the train bathroom. Takagi also struggles being with Sato as he wants to date her.
22.TitleJapanese: 新幹線護送事件（後編）

23.SummaryEnglish: Genta is the target of a killer! The Detective Boys try to figure out why Genta is being targeted.
23.TitleJapanese: 元太少年の災難

24.SummaryEnglish: An imposter of Kogoro’s is found hung in his hotel room. Another body is found outside the hotel, but it has been there much longer. What is happening in this hotel?
24.TitleJapanese: 毛利小五郎のニセ者（前編）

25.SummaryEnglish: After an embezzlement of funds and a double-crossing amongst thieves, Conan is able to wrap up the imposter mystery!
25.TitleJapanese: 毛利小五郎のニセ者（後編）

26.TitleEnglish: The Gunshot in the Sunflower Building
26.SummaryEnglish: An architect is shot in the head, allegedly by a stalker. What do the other firm employees have to do with this?
26.TitleJapanese: ヒマワリ館の銃声

27.TitleEnglish: The Mystery in the Net (Part One)
27.SummaryEnglish: Haibara and Ran are having issues getting along at the beach. A local fishermen group appears at the beach and later one of them washes up on shore in a net.
27.TitleJapanese: 網にかかった謎（前編）

28.TitleEnglish: The Mystery in the Net (Part Two)
28.SummaryEnglish: The killer bumbles his testimony while speaking with the police and Conan catches on! Haibara and Ran improve their relationship.
28.TitleJapanese: 網にかかった謎（後編）

29.TitleEnglish: The Alibi of the Soothing Forest
29.SummaryEnglish: In a place called the “Soothing Forest” there is a small village. The village chief is found dead, but everyone in the village has an alibi.
29.TitleJapanese: 癒しの森のアリバイ

30.SummaryEnglish: Kogoro is invited to Yoko's engagement--no, Yoko's friend's engagement with a famous actor. When Kogoro arrives, though, he is hit with a tennis racket by mistake! It turned out that Yoko's frind had been blackmailed by an unknown person, and had been very careful when opening doors since. While everyone is watching a video, Yoko's friend goes showering. After quite a time Conan realises that something must be wrong and goes into the bathroom to find Yoko's friend lying in the bathtub with her neck cut.
30.TitleJapanese: アイドル達の秘密（前編）

31.SummaryEnglish: It turned out that Yoko's friend wasn't dead yet- she just suffered from a serious cut. The police arrived quickly (with Megure commenting one how easily Kogoro finds his job),but they couldn't find the murder weapon. All they found was a bloody trail leading to the back to and a bloodied coat. Thus they concluded that the attacker must be Yoko's friend's blackmailer, and was not one of the people watching the videotape. But Conan suspects that the murder weapon had been discarded cleverly. And he isn't going to give up until he finds the brutal killer!
31.TitleJapanese: アイドル達の秘密（後編）

32.TitleEnglish: The Tragedy at the OK Corral
32.SummaryEnglish: Conan, Ran, and Kogoro visit a horse farm. One of the men there dies – is a horse responsible?
32.TitleJapanese: OK牧場の悲劇

33.TitleEnglish: The Kidnapper in the Picture
33.SummaryEnglish: The Detective Boys are on the hunt for a kidnapping clown! They must follow the clues left behind in order to save a 5 year old boy from his kidnapper.
33.TitleJapanese: 絵の中の誘拐犯

34.SummaryEnglish: Sato is having an arranged marriage meeting with a man due to her mother's persistence. She arrives to find out it's Ninzaburo Shiratori. She proposes that if Takagi does not arrive to her before sunset, she will marry him whether she wants to or not. He accepts, but Takagi is busy with a store robbery. Three of the eye witnesses all give different description and three culprits are kept in the back of the police car. Conan on the phone prepares to help Takagi solve the case as Kudo Shinichi.
34.TitleJapanese: 本庁の刑事恋物語４（前編）

35.SummaryEnglish: Takagi solves the case and arrests the culprit when he tries to make a dash out of the police car. Takagi catches up and gives up on going to Sato in time to stop the marriage as the sun is almost set and the car is too far away. His party comes to cheer him on and he runs. Conan manages to stop the marriage in time with Tomoaki Araide's help. Takagi manages to reach the restaurant but the sun has completely sunk. He then sees Sato around the corner who tells him he told her an emergency case has come up. Takagi smiles as he enters the car. Meanwhile Shiratori leaves the restaurant, disappointed in his close marriage. Conan comments how Takagi and Sato reminded him of Ran and himself.
35.TitleJapanese: 本庁の刑事恋物語４（後編）

1.TitleEnglish: The 14th Round of the Matsue Tamazo Linked Verse Contest (Part 1)
1.SummaryEnglish: After Kogoro wins a trip to Matsue, they meet a group holding a poetry contest. Soon enough, one of the members is beaten to death and every other member is not sad to see him dead.
1.TitleJapanese: 松江玉造連句14番勝負（前編）

2.TitleEnglish: The 14th Round of the Matsue Tamazo Linked Verse Contest (Part 2)
2.SummaryEnglish: Conan has Kogoro take place in the Linked Verse contest to see how the culprit may reveal themself.
2.TitleJapanese: 松江玉造連句14番勝負（後編）

3.TitleEnglish: The Mysterious Punishment from Heaven
3.SummaryEnglish: A robber is found dead in a temple following an earthquake. However, the robber is stealing from a poor temple far from his home. Something is awry with this case.
3.TitleJapanese: 世にも奇妙な天罰

4.TitleEnglish: The Man From Chicago (1)
4.SummaryEnglish: Conan, Agasa, and the Detective Boys run into an old man named James Black who is being hassled by people, mistaking him for a celebrity. They help him get away and clear the confusion, but later, the man ends up getting kidnapped. Can Conan and the Detective Boys rescue him?
4.TitleJapanese: シカゴから来た男（前編）

5.SummaryEnglish: The kidnappers have apprehended a police car. Conan and the police force set off to rescue James Black and apprehend the thieves.
5.TitleJapanese: シカゴから来た男（後編）

6.TitleEnglish: The Shaking Restaurant
6.SummaryEnglish: Due to nearby construction, a restaurant has been shaking constantly causing broken plates and glasses. When the owner is found dead the next day, it looks like an accident, but is it?
6.TitleJapanese: 揺れるレストラン

7.TitleEnglish: The Fearful Legend of the Snowy Night (1)
7.SummaryEnglish: Kogoro, Ran, and Conan get stranded on a snowy road on their way to a hot spring. They meet the Daimon family, who lets them stay the night, but the next morning one of them has been found dead.
7.TitleJapanese: 雪の夜の恐怖伝説（前編）

8.TitleEnglish: The Fearful Legend of the Snowy Night (2)
8.SummaryEnglish: The father and eldest brother have been killed. Is this the work of a 500-year-old samurai curse or something more nefarious?
8.TitleJapanese: 雪の夜の恐怖伝説（後編）

9.TitleEnglish: The Osaka Double Mystery - The Swordsman and Toyotomi's Castle
9.SummaryEnglish: Conan discovers a trick with the armor and footprints which lead him to the culprits trick!
9.TitleJapanese: 大阪ダブルミステリー　浪花剣士と太閤の城

10.TitleEnglish: The Courtroom Battle: Kisaki vs Kogoro (1)
10.SummaryEnglish: Eri Kirisaki takes a case that results in Kogoro being a key witness and alibi for the prime suspect. Will Eri win or does Kogoro provide a legitimate alibi?
10.TitleJapanese: 法廷の対決　妃ＶＳ小五郎（前編）

11.TitleEnglish: The Courtroom Battle: Kisaki vs Kogoro (2)
11.SummaryEnglish: The prosecutor turns the table on Eri when Kogoro’s testimony is turned upside down. Can Kogoro find the evidence needed in time?
11.TitleJapanese: 法廷の対決　妃ＶＳ小五郎（後編）

12.SummaryEnglish: Sonoko and Ran go to a house in the hills to make Valentine’s chocolate. While there, the group runs into other patrons visiting for various reasons. Following a snowstorm, one of them is found dead.
12.TitleJapanese: バレンタインの真実 (事件編)

13.SummaryEnglish: The dead photographer’s camera has droplets of blood on it, leading Conan to believe the murder took place before the snowstorm.
13.TitleJapanese: バレンタインの真実（推理編）

14.SummaryEnglish: As Kogoro is unveiling the culprit, other’s reveal plans of their own!
14.TitleJapanese: バレンタインの真実（解決編）

15.TitleEnglish: The Forgotten Memento from the Crime (1)
15.SummaryEnglish: Kogoro passes up a case for finding a man’s deceased wife’s watch and the Detective Boys take it on. The search is put on pause when a murder takes place nearby.
15.TitleJapanese: 犯罪の忘れ形見（前編）

16.TitleEnglish: The Forgotten Memento from the Crime (2)
16.SummaryEnglish: Conan believes the client hired them to be his alibi. Takagi reveals important files have been stolen from the Metropolitan Police Department.
16.TitleJapanese: 犯罪の忘れ形見（後編）

17.SummaryEnglish: Ran is still puzzled by her run in with Shuichi Akai, feeling she has seen him before. Later, while Ran is in the mall with Conan, Sonoko, and Jodie a murder occurs.
17.TitleJapanese: 隠して急いで省略（前編）

18.SummaryEnglish: Conan needs to solve the dying message in order to find the culprit. The Black Organization is on the move.
18.TitleJapanese: 隠して急いで省略（後編）

19.SummaryEnglish: Ayumi believes the old lady who feeds birds at the park has been kidnapped. The Detective Boy’s set out to find her kidnappers.
19.TitleJapanese: クイズ婆さん失踪事件

20.SummaryEnglish: While investigating a ghost case, Ran, Conan, and Kogoro stay the night at an apartment building. During the night, she sees a ghost on the TV screen! The water in the toilet turns red!
20.TitleJapanese: 幽霊屋敷の真実 (前編）

21.TitleEnglish: Truth About the Haunted House (2)
21.SummaryEnglish: The group learns two years’ prior there had been a fire and one of the residents died. Conan determines the culprit’s trick and who is behind the ghosts!

22.TitleEnglish: Case of the Missing Policeman's Notebook
22.SummaryEnglish: Takagi breaks up a scuffle between a singer and their manager and loses his notebook in the process. Finding it out is not as easy when the Detective Boy’s learn of a devious plan at hand.
22.TitleJapanese: 警察手帳紛失事件

23.TitleEnglish: English Teacher VS Great Western Detective (1)
23.SummaryEnglish: Conan has Heiji investigate Jodie at her apartment building, but when one of her neighbors is thrown from the building, things change quickly.
23.TitleJapanese: 英語教師ＶＳ西の名探偵（前編）

24.TitleEnglish: English Teacher VS Great Western Detective (2)
24.SummaryEnglish: Conan and Heiji have Jodie assist them with the investigation, but they continue their investigation of her on their own.
24.TitleJapanese: 英語教師ＶＳ西の名探偵（後編）

25.SummaryEnglish: The group is watching a soccer match between the Tokyo Spirits and Noir. Following the game, a man is found stabbed inside a train.
25.TitleJapanese: 迷宮のフーリガン（前編）

26.SummaryEnglish: Haibara is seen watching Higo, a soccer player, who’s circumstances mimic her own. When Conan explains the situation, he realizes something about the crime.
26.TitleJapanese: 迷宮のフーリガン（後編）

27.SummaryEnglish: While playing a horror game in an abandoned house, Ayumi, Mitsuhiko, and Genta realize they are not alone. They overhear two men arguing, then fighting, and one dies. Can Conan get there in time to help them?
27.TitleJapanese: 小さな目撃者たち

28.TitleEnglish: Mystery of the Water Flowing Stone Garden (1)
28.SummaryEnglish: Conan, Ran, and Kogoro attend a dinner party with a company president and various other attendees. The next morning the president is found in the water-stone garden.
28.TitleJapanese: 水流るる石庭の怪（前編）

29.TitleEnglish: Mystery of the Water Flowing Stone Garden (2)
29.SummaryEnglish: There are no footprints surrounding the presidents body. Kogoro and Conan differ on how they think the crime occurred.
29.TitleJapanese: 水流るる石庭の怪（後編）

30.TitleEnglish: Chinatown Deja Vu in the Rain (1)
30.SummaryEnglish: While eating at a Chinese restaurant, Kogoro, Conan, and Ran share a table with other people. During dinner, one of them dies. Ran is a suspect?!
30.TitleJapanese: 中華街雨のデジャビュ（前編）

31.TitleEnglish: Chinatown Deja Vu in the Rain (2)
31.SummaryEnglish: Ran begins to look sick throughout the investigation, her mind is elsewhere. The victim was killed with cyanide, but how? Ran remembers her original meeting with Shuichi Akai.
31.TitleJapanese: 中華街雨のデジャビュ（後編）

1.SummaryEnglish: Ran collapses in the Chinese restaurant and begins to dream of her trip to New York City with Shinichi several years prior.
1.TitleJapanese: 工藤新一ＮＹの事件（事件編）

2.TitleEnglish: Kudo Shinichi's NY Case (Part Two)
2.SummaryEnglish: While attending a play in New York, a murder happens right on stage! A serial killer is also on the loose.
2.TitleJapanese: 工藤新一ＮＹの事件（推理編）

3.TitleEnglish: Kudo Shinichi's NY Case (Part Three)
3.SummaryEnglish: Ran recalls her first meeting with Shuichi Akai in New York City. Ran and Shinichi encounter the serial killer!
3.TitleJapanese: 工藤新一ＮＹの事件（解決編）

4.TitleEnglish: Mitsuhiko's Mystifying Forest (Part One)
4.SummaryEnglish: Mitsuhiko has disappeared! Conan is able to track him to a forest in Gunma, but what is he doing there?
4.TitleJapanese: 迷いの森の光彦（前編）

5.SummaryEnglish: Haibara divulges information about APTX 4869 to Conan. Mitsuhiko encounters a serial killer hiding in the forest!
5.TitleJapanese: 迷いの森の光彦（後編）

6.TitleEnglish: Solitary Island of the Princess and the Dragon King's Palace (Part One)
6.SummaryEnglish: Heiji, Conan, and Kogoro go to Okinawa for a Detective Competition, but they get abandoned on an island when the boat captain goes missing.
6.TitleJapanese: 孤島の姫と龍宮城（事件編）

7.TitleEnglish: Solitary Island of the Princess and the Dragon King's Palace (Part Two)
7.SummaryEnglish: Heiji and Conan discover clues about a kidnapping while investigating the abandoned house. When the house search is conducted, a loud crash happens!
7.TitleJapanese: 孤島の姫と龍宮城（追求編）

8.TitleEnglish: Solitary Island of the Princess and the Dragon King's Palace (Part Three)
8.SummaryEnglish: The boat is found destroyed and the captain beaten to death. What does the TV Crew they are with have to do with the kidnapping and this abandoned island?
8.TitleJapanese: 孤島の姫と龍宮城（解決編）

9.TitleEnglish: Smash of Love and Determination (Part One)
9.SummaryEnglish: Ran and Sonoko find a cell phone with a mysterious message on it for Sonoko. Disguised as Sonoko, Ran goes to meet the mysterious sender and is kidnapped!
9.TitleJapanese: 愛と決断のスマッシュ（前編）

10.TitleEnglish: Smash of Love and Determination (Part Two)
10.SummaryEnglish: Ran manages to leave some clues about her kidnappers. Following the apprehension of two of the criminals, Ran tells the group there was a third!
10.TitleJapanese: 愛と決断のスマッシュ（後編）

11.SummaryEnglish: While watching fireworks from a fish boat restaurant, one of the fisherman falls on another and one gets electrocuted!
11.TitleJapanese: 屋形船　釣りショック

12.TitleEnglish: Courtroom Confrontation 2 Kisaki VS Kujo Reiko (Part One)
12.SummaryEnglish: Eri Kisaki finds herself defending a burglar being charged with murder, but something is crooked with the case! Ran has Kogoro investigate.
12.TitleJapanese: 法廷の対決II　妃ＶＳ九条（前編）

13.TitleEnglish: Courtroom Confrontation 2 Kisaki VS Kujo Reiko (Part Two)
13.SummaryEnglish: Kogoro and Conan are able to find a hole in the testimony! What did the witness hide?
13.TitleJapanese: 法廷の対決II　妃ＶＳ九条（後編）

14.TitleEnglish: Kanmon Strait of Friendship & Murderous Intent (Part One)
14.SummaryEnglish: While at dinner, Conan, Ran, and Kogoro witness a man at another table insulting everyone around him. Later that night, he has been found dead.
14.TitleJapanese: 友情と殺意の関門海峡（前編）

15.TitleEnglish: Kanmon Strait of Friendship & Murderous Intent (Part Two)
15.SummaryEnglish: The group of friends is discovered to have a sad past. What did the group do to get rid of this man?
15.TitleJapanese: 友情と殺意の関門海峡（後編）

16.TitleEnglish: Parade of Malice and Saint (Part One)
16.SummaryEnglish: The Tokyo Spirits (Soccer team) have won J1! There's a parade in honor for them and they're going throughout the city. The Police are there in disguise steaking out a boming that might take place. In the meantime...there is a bombing. When Takagi's car blows up, everyone is in a panic. During this, Mitsuhiko's video camera was stolen. Though the criminal went away with a blank tape. Why did the person steal his camera? And with many other bombings, can the police stop this person?
16.TitleJapanese: 悪意と聖者の行進（前編）

17.TitleEnglish: Parade of Malice and Saint (Part Two)
17.SummaryEnglish: With Takagi-kun in charge of checking over the video tape with the Detective Boys, Conan notices something unusual. With the absence of something that should be there, the Detective Boys help solve the case, and the culprits are caught....but is everything solved?
17.TitleJapanese: 悪意と聖者の行進（後編）

18.SummaryEnglish: The Detective Boys go to investigate a thief. During their investigation, however, a murder occurs!

19.TitleEnglish: Trembling Metropolitan Police Headquarters 12 Million Hostages
19.SummaryEnglish: The death of Satou's last partner haunts her when she is put up against the same bomber. The bomber likes to place bombs around the city. Some bombs will display the location of an even bigger bomb if left for the last three seconds, this resulted in the death of Satou's partner in the past. After following clues placed by the bomber, Takagi and Conan are trapped in an elevator, where they await the bomb's clue to the location of an even bigger bomb. Conan disarms the bomb before the last second as he has already figured out the last part of the code. He stops the bomber and he is captured.
19.TitleJapanese: 揺れる警視庁　1200万人の人質

20.SummaryEnglish: Mori Kogoro was invited to make an introduction in an episode of a popular detective TV serial. The star of the show revealed himself to be very disagreeable with the rest of the cast, one of whom, Ruri Amaki (雨城 琉璃, Amaki Ruri?) turned out to be a fellow classmate of Kogoro when they were children. Ruri revealed to Ran and Conan who were present that she, Kogoro, and Kisaki, were classmates since kindergarten. Ran and Conan learned that the brainy Kisaki and the underachiever Kogoro seemed inexplicably drawn to each other, to quarrel. As the other classmates suspected, time showed that the arguments were intended to disguise their mutual attraction. The star challenged Kogoro to solve the mystery of the murder scene being filmed. To prevent Kogoro from embarrassing himself, Conan used the tranquilizer dart on Kogoro and cracked the puzzle with the clues present. During a break in the filming, the star was discovered with his throat slit, with Ruri over the body and her hands bloody.
20.TitleJapanese: 見えない容疑者（前編）

21.TitleEnglish: Unseen Suspect (part 2)
21.SummaryEnglish: During a break in the filming, the star was discovered with his throat slit, with Ruri over the body and her hands bloody. No murder weapon could be found. The immediate suspects were members of the cast, including Ruri and the Nagumo (南雲?) father-son. As the murder took place in the jurisdiction of Shizuoka Prefecture (静岡県, Shizuoka-ken?), Inspector Sango Yokomizo (横溝 参悟, Yokomizo Sango?) arrived to take charge of the investigation. Kogoro and Conan worked hard to find the clues. When Conan finally figured out the solution, he realized he had used up his only tranquilizer dart earlier, and had to resort to nudging Kogoro towards the truth.

22.TitleEnglish: The Dark Footprint (part 1)
22.SummaryEnglish: Conan and Mouri stumble upon the murder of a game designer, one that appears to have had a link to Tequila, the member of the Black Organization who was killed in an explosion in episode 54. He attempts to solve the case while gathering info on the organization in the process.
22.TitleJapanese: 残された声なき証言（前編）

23.SummaryEnglish: Conan uses Mouri to solve the case, using clues gathered during the investigation. It turns out that the system of "Braille" has something to do with the identification of the murderer, but how? After the case is solved, Ran and Conan go walking in the city. They find themselves face to face with Shuichi Akai who just happens to be exiting out of a phone booth, ending the episode with the mysterious encounter.
23.TitleJapanese: 残された声なき証言（後編）

24.TitleEnglish: Contact with the Black Organization: Negotiation Chapter
24.SummaryEnglish: Conan learns that Shuichi Akai is not a bad guy, but with the FBI. Conan makes contact with the Black Organization and tries to trap Vodka.
24.TitleJapanese: 黒の組織との接触（交渉編）

25.TitleEnglish: Contact with the Black Organization: Pursuit Chapter
25.SummaryEnglish: Conan and Agasa make their move, but are stranded and picked up in a car with two criminals behind the wheel.
25.TitleJapanese: 黒の組織との接触（追跡編）

26.TitleEnglish: Contact with the Black Organization: Desperation Chapter
26.SummaryEnglish: Conan confronts the criminals driving the car. Conan gets close enough to Vodka to place a tracker on him, but Gin discovers it and hunts for Conan.
26.TitleJapanese: 黒の組織との接触（決死編）

27.TitleEnglish: Festival Dolls Dyed in the Setting Sun (Part 1)
27.SummaryEnglish: The Detective Boys help Ayumi with assembling and arranging traditional dolls for a client. After they run an errand, they return the apartment having been burglarized!
27.TitleJapanese: 夕日に染まった雛人形（前編）

28.TitleEnglish: Festival Dolls Dyed in the Setting Sun (Part 2)
28.SummaryEnglish: Some art is missing from the apartment after the robbery. However, something about the doll arrangement gives Conan a clue.
28.TitleJapanese: 夕日に染まった雛人形（後編）

29.SummaryEnglish: Conan, Kogoro, and Ran witness a man committing suicide by jumping off a cliff. Yet, after they see the body there is something suspicious about it.
29.TitleJapanese: 壊れた柵の展望台

30.SummaryEnglish: Kogoro visits an old friend who has been depressed as of lately. The friend has been irritated and nasty towards those around him. When he is found dead later, Kogoro investigates.

1.SummaryEnglish: A pro-wrestling match is happening. A wolf-masked wrestler is seen on camera murdering his opponent. Is it the wrestler or an imposter?
1.TitleJapanese: 穢れた覆面ヒーロー (前編)

2.TitleEnglish: The Tarnished Masked Hero (Part Two)
2.SummaryEnglish: Conan solves the case, but the murderer escapes and goes on a tear!
2.TitleJapanese: 穢れた覆面ヒーロー (後編)

3.TitleEnglish: Cigar Case of Good Fortune (Part One)
3.SummaryEnglish: After the owner of a business is found stabbed, the prime suspect is also found dead, having crashed his car.
3.TitleJapanese: 幸運のシガーケース（前編）

4.TitleEnglish: Cigar Case of Good Fortune (Part Two)
4.SummaryEnglish: The owner is still alive and the video of the stabbing is fishy. What really happened?
4.TitleJapanese: 幸運のシガーケース（後編）

5.SummaryEnglish: Inspector Megure calls in Kogoro for assistance with an investigation. A client of Kogoro’s has been murdered.
5.TitleJapanese: 忍法アリバイ工作の術

6.TitleEnglish: The Vanished Kidnapper's Getaway Car (Part One)
6.SummaryEnglish: A classmate of the Detective Boy’s is hospitalized. They help him enjoy one day of freedom by leaving Conan in his place at the hospital.
6.TitleJapanese: 消えた誘拐逃走車（前編）

7.TitleEnglish: The Vanished Kidnapper's Getaway Car (Part Two)
7.SummaryEnglish: While Conan is posing as the boy he is kidnapped from the hospital. The Detective Boys go searching for Conan when he does not answer his badge.
7.TitleJapanese: 消えた誘拐逃走車（後編）

8.SummaryEnglish: Heiji is being held captive in an attic! He desperately tried to contact Conan for help.
8.TitleJapanese: 服部平次絶体絶命!（前編）

9.SummaryEnglish: Conan gets Heiji’s message and sends a hidden message back. The henchmen watch over Kazuha and threaten to kill her if Heiji does not cooperate.
9.TitleJapanese: 服部平次絶体絶命!（後編）

10.TitleEnglish: Red Horse Inside the Flame: Incident Chapter
10.SummaryEnglish: Heiji has a client in Tokyo who suddenly turns him down. Shortly thereafter, her home burns down!
10.TitleJapanese: 炎の中に赤い馬（事件編）

11.TitleEnglish: Red Horse Inside the Flame: Investigation Chapter
11.SummaryEnglish: The arson incidents have been happening one district at a time, the fourth in the 4th district. The 5th district could be next, home to the Mouri Detective Agency!
11.TitleJapanese: 炎の中に赤い馬（捜査編）

12.TitleEnglish: Red Horse Inside the Flame: Solution Chapter
12.SummaryEnglish: Conan and Heiji continue investigating the string of arson incidents. They manage to narrow the suspect list down to four people.
12.TitleJapanese: 炎の中に赤い馬（解決編）

13.SummaryEnglish: At a birthday party somebody dies after drinking wine. The only problem is someone drank it before them and did not die!
13.TitleJapanese: バースデーワインの謎

14.SummaryEnglish: Professor Agasa takes the Detective Boys on a camping excursion where they run into four college students. As the group goes to the mountaintop to watch fireworks, on their way back a body is in the road.
14.TitleJapanese: お金で買えない友情（前編）

15.SummaryEnglish: It appears like Yasumi Shirafuji lost control of her bike and fell off a cliff. Was it an accident or did one of the college students cleverly murder her?
15.TitleJapanese: お金で買えない友情（後編）

16.SummaryEnglish: After their van washed away in a storm, Conan and the group try to find shelter. They run into a man they met at a tennis court earlier who takes them in.
16.TitleJapanese: 疑惑の辛口カレー（前編）

17.SummaryEnglish: After getting into the house, the man’s father is found hung in his room! Why are some of his teeth missing?
17.TitleJapanese: 疑惑の辛口カレー（後編）

18.SummaryEnglish: Eri and Yukiko take on a case in Kogoro’s stead watching a rich woman’s husband. During the investigation, Eri and Yukiko reminisce over their high school days.
18.TitleJapanese: 似た者プリンセス（前編）

19.SummaryEnglish: The husband is murdered! With Conan’s help, Yukiko and Eri work to solve the case.
19.TitleJapanese: 似た者プリンセス（後編）

20.TitleEnglish: Secret of the Touto Film Developer Place (Part One)
20.SummaryEnglish: Yukiko Kudo takes the Detective Boy’s to the see the a sneak preview for the Kamen Yaiba film. However, the preview was postponed and the Detective Boy’s go with one of the film’s employees while they wait.
20.TitleJapanese: 東都現像所の秘密（前編）

21.TitleEnglish: Secret of the Touto Film Developer Place (Part Two)
21.SummaryEnglish: A murder happens in the film workers apartment while the Detective Boy’s are there. All of the inhabitants of the apartment had a grudge against the victim.
21.TitleJapanese: 東都現像所の秘密（後編）

22.TitleEnglish: Hidden Circumstances of the Falling Incident
22.SummaryEnglish: Kogoro and Conan witness two men fighting over a backpack. Later, when one of them apparently dies in an accident, Kogoro and Conan investigate whether it is a murder under the guise of an accident.
22.TitleJapanese: 転落事件の裏事情

23.SummaryEnglish: Conan and Professor Agasa see four Porsches in a parking lot, with a man sleeping in one of them. After eating, when they return to the parking lot, the man is dead.
23.TitleJapanese: 4台のポルシェ（前編）

24.SummaryEnglish: A suspicious Jodie prods about Haibara during the investigation. What is she looking for?
24.TitleJapanese: 4台のポルシェ（後編）

25.SummaryEnglish: Some of Haibara’s past is divulged. When she and the Professor visit a friend, he ends up murdered. Is this the Black Organization or something else?
25.TitleJapanese: トイレに隠した秘密（前編）

26.SummaryEnglish: Conan helps solve the mystery while also uncovering mementos of Haibara’s deceased mother.
26.TitleJapanese: トイレに隠した秘密（後編）

27.SummaryEnglish: While attending a wedding, Ran, Sonoko, and Conan witness some ugly tensions on the groom’s side of the family. Tensions only worsen when the ring cannot be found.
27.TitleJapanese: ハウステンボスの花嫁

28.SummaryEnglish: After getting wind of Jodie's message that she's leaving from the high school, Ran and Sonoko decide to throw a good-bye party for her. They head for a convience store where they know a friend that works there. when they get there though, they find her boss accusing her of stealing goods. Is this possible?
28.TitleJapanese: コンビニの落とし穴（前編）

29.SummaryEnglish: This case continues and from last time, Sonoko and Jodie advise her not to call Conan for help, so Ran decides to solve it on her own. Taking repeated advice from Shin'ichi that she's heard, she has the theory to solve this case, and help Aya possibly.
29.TitleJapanese: コンビニの落とし穴（後編）

30.TitleEnglish: Head-to-Head Match With Black Organization, Two Mysteries Night of the Full Moon
30.SummaryEnglish: Mystery One: Kogoro is invited to an ""off"" Halloween party on a cruise ship. by Vermouth. The guests have to dress as monsters. Ran not wanting to go, Sonoko takes her place instead. Meanwhile Shin'ichi is also invited. But he knows by the reaction of Ai that she is from the Black Organization. How can he go to the party and not reveal his true form? This case twists when a famous movie director is murdered. Mystery Two: Jodie has been having an interesting memory flashback, about a murder. But while Ai still has a cold, Dr. Araide is coming over to take her to a hospital. Though before he arrives, Jodie takes Ai in her car to meet him there instead. Though when Dr. Araide cuts them off on the road, some interesting questions are answered. The cases are intertwined somehow and this night might answer some questions in this two hour special.
30.TitleJapanese: 黒の組織と真っ向勝負 満月の夜の二元ミステリー

31.SummaryEnglish: Following the encounter with the Black Organization, the FBI requests Haibara to go into Witness Protection. The Detective Boy’s stumble onto a case that Takagi and Sato are pursuing.
31.TitleJapanese: お尻のマークを探せ（前編）

32.TitleEnglish: Find the Buttocks' Mark! (Part Two)
32.SummaryEnglish: Takagi and Sato round up several suspects and Ayumi recognizes the culprit, but does not know what to do. Haibara and Ayumi help each other get past their respective hurdles.
32.TitleJapanese: お尻のマークを探せ（後編）

33.TitleEnglish: Love, A Ghost and A Wordly Inheritance (Part One)
33.SummaryEnglish: When a man is murdered in an old-fashioned village, his body is discovered with a ghost next to it!
33.TitleJapanese: 愛と幽霊と地球遺産（前編）

34.TitleEnglish: Love, A Ghost and A Wordly Inheritance (Part Two)
34.SummaryEnglish: Conan and the Detective Boy’s discover the ghost’s origin and how a heist leads to a murder.
34.TitleJapanese: 愛と幽霊と地球遺産（後編）

35.SummaryEnglish: Azusa of Café Poirot gives Kogoro a lost phone that has been receiving angry calls. Conan begins investigating and it turns out the police are investigating the same person.
35.TitleJapanese: 忘れられた携帯電話（前編）

36.SummaryEnglish: Working with Yumi, Conan discovers the code behind the messages on the phone, which leads them to the identity of a dead man.
36.TitleJapanese: 忘れられた携帯電話（後編）

37.SummaryEnglish: During a fishing tournament, all the fishermen spread out to catch on their own. One of them turns up dead, but nobody was near them.
37.TitleJapanese: フィッシング大会の悲劇（前編）

38.SummaryEnglish: The police begin checking all of the participant’s alibis. One of them does not have one, but Conan finds evidence that leads him to another suspect.
38.TitleJapanese: フィッシング大会の悲劇（後編）

1.SummaryEnglish: A seven year old movie star by the name of Kazuki Kinukawa comes to the Moore office to try and find his mother who abandoned him at the office. His reasons are to tell his mother he will not give her any money now that he is famous. Conan finds out that the kids mother is at Atami due to the old dirty postcards she sent him. Kazuki reveals that he remembered that his mother had a mole near her breast. A man who is trying to confirm the rumor that Kazuki's father is a murderer is found dead in a tub.
1.TitleJapanese: 小さな依頼者（前編）

2.TitleEnglish: A Small Client (Part 2)
2.SummaryEnglish: A picture is found on his cellphone; The culprit is a woman with a mole near her breast. Conan finds out who the murderer is. Conan also figures out the culprit was one of the woman who pretended to be his mother and was the one to spread the rumors. Conan reveals that his real mother is also here, and that she truly loved her son and the same for her son; the postcards were dirty because they were stained with tears. While signing autographs, Kazuki gives his mother a postcard and tells her to send it to him or he'll visit her again. He leaves while wearing his sunglasses and his mother cries and apologizes to her son.
2.TitleJapanese: 小さな依頼者（後編）

3.TitleEnglish: Kaito Kid's Miracle Midair Walk
3.SummaryEnglish: Sonoko's uncle wants to capture Kaito Kid to improve his fame. Kaito Kid arrives on the scene and seemingly walks on air to investigate the treasure he will steal. Conan investigates and finds out the trick Kaito Kid used. The second time Kaito Kid tries to steal the jewel but it was revealed to be a distraction. Kaito Kid steals the jewel from indoors and is making his escape on a motorcycle when Conan is found to be on the passenger seat. Kaito Kid manages to lose Conan and escape once again.
3.TitleJapanese: 怪盗キッドの驚異空中歩行

4.TitleEnglish: Sweetheart is an Illusion of Spring
4.SummaryEnglish: Ran and Sonoko run into a friend of Ran’s named Sachiko. Ran is jealous Sachiko is out shopping for her lover.
4.TitleJapanese: 恋人は春のまぼろし

5.SummaryEnglish: Takagi and Sato are on a date at Tropical Island while the Tokyo police force try and prevent Takagi from making a move with Sato. Later, the Detective Boys are bought up and Takagi and Sato are forced to watch over them. Later Takagi's bag with a wedding ring in it is switched, and Takagi finds out he has a bag of cocaine.
5.TitleJapanese: 恋人は春のまぼろし

6.TitleEnglish: Metropolitan Police Detective Love Story 5 (Part 2)
6.SummaryEnglish: With evidence from the bag and elimination, they are able to track down the culprit and arrest him but Takagi's bag is lost in the ocean in the process.
6.TitleJapanese: 本庁の刑事恋物語5（後編）

7.SummaryEnglish: When the Detective Boy’s visit a pet shop, they discover the owner dead! They follow clues to see if they can find the murderer.
7.TitleJapanese: 不思議な春のかぶと虫

8.SummaryEnglish: Sonoko, Ran, and Conan go to the school where they discover the real Dr. Araide is back. He informs Conan of what happened, and told him that Jodie told him to tell him everything. Later, Sonoko rants on about the death of a student terrorizing the school, and tells them stories to support this claim. Later the desk is found outside with a name on it. What's strange is that it's raining, yet, there's no footprints in the mud.
8.TitleJapanese: 帝丹高校学校怪談（前編）

9.SummaryEnglish: Conan solves the case and reveals the culprit was a close friend to the dead student. The culprit reveals that he found his friend's desk in the storage room with a name on it, thinking he was murdered. The other students reveal that he died saving a student that fell off the stairs while holding a heavy sculpture. Another student explains that his desk was put in the storage room to store his desk for graduation and was not to hide evidence. Dr.Araide reveals that the dead student held no grudges when he died.
9.TitleJapanese: 帝丹高校学校怪談（後編）

10.TitleEnglish: The City's Crows
